quiz.question: tempestuous ______
quiz.explanation: 暴风雨般的; 激烈的, 激烈的恋情. Their tempestuous affair ended in heartbreak. 他们激烈的恋情以心碎告终。

quiz.question: mischievous _____
quiz.explanation: 淘气的; 恶作剧的, 淘气的恶作剧. The children played a mischievous prank on their teacher. 孩子们对老师玩了一个淘气的恶作剧。

quiz.question: ______ rendezvous
quiz.explanation: 约会; 会面, 秘密约会. The spies arranged a secret rendezvous at midnight. 间谍安排了午夜的秘密约会。

quiz.question: opus ______
quiz.explanation: 作品, 巨著. The novel was considered the author's opus magnum. 这部小说被认为是作者的巨著。

quiz.question: _____ corpus
quiz.explanation: 文集; 全集, 人体. Medical students study the human corpus in anatomy class. 医学生在解剖课上研究人体。

quiz.question: walrus ____
quiz.explanation: 海象, 海象牙. The walrus tusk can grow up to three feet long. 海象牙可以长到三英尺长。

quiz.question: _______ chorus
quiz.explanation: 合唱; 合唱团, 歌唱合唱. The singing chorus performed a beautiful rendition. 歌唱合唱演唱了一首优美的曲目。

quiz.question: papyrus ______
quiz.explanation: 纸莎草纸, 纸莎草纸卷. Ancient Egyptians wrote on papyrus scroll documents. 古埃及人在纸莎草纸卷文件上书写。

quiz.question: ________ census
quiz.explanation: 人口普查, 全国人口普查. The government conducts a national census every ten years. 政府每十年进行一次全国人口普查。

quiz.question: _____ consensus
quiz.explanation: 共识; 一致意见, 广泛共识. The committee reached a broad consensus on the issue. 委员会就该问题达成了广泛共识。

quiz.question: ________ colossus
quiz.explanation: 巨人; 巨像, 高耸的巨像. The ancient statue was a towering colossus overlooking the harbor. 这座古老的雕像是俯瞰港口的高耸巨像。

quiz.question: _____ hiatus
quiz.explanation: 间断; 空隙, 短暂的间断. After a brief hiatus, the band resumed touring. 经过短暂的间断后,乐队恢复了巡演。

quiz.question: __________ apparatus
quiz.explanation: 装置; 器械, 科学仪器. The laboratory is equipped with advanced scientific apparatus. 实验室配备了先进的科学仪器。

quiz.question: ______ status
quiz.explanation: 地位; 状态, 社会地位. Wealth often correlates with social status. 财富常常与社会地位相关。

quiz.question: ______ cactus
quiz.explanation: 仙人掌, 沙漠仙人掌. The desert cactus can survive extreme drought conditions. 沙漠仙人掌可以在极端干旱条件下生存。

quiz.question: _____ conspectus
quiz.explanation: 概要; 纲要, 简短的概要. The professor provided a brief conspectus of the course. 教授提供了课程的简短概要。

quiz.question: _____ fetus
quiz.explanation: 胎儿, 人类胎儿. The ultrasound showed a healthy human fetus. 超声波显示了一个健康的人类胎儿。

quiz.question: _____ impetus
quiz.explanation: 推动力; 动力, 新的动力. The discovery gave fresh impetus to the research. 这一发现为研究提供了新的动力。

quiz.question: eucalyptus ___
quiz.explanation: 桉树, 桉树油. Eucalyptus oil is used in many medicinal products. 桉树油用于许多药用产品。

quiz.question: ______ nexus
quiz.explanation: 联系; 连接, 社会联系. The city serves as a social nexus for the region. 这座城市是该地区的社会联系枢纽。

quiz.question: gallows _____
quiz.explanation: 绞刑架, 黑色幽默. His gallows humor helped cope with difficult situations. 他的黑色幽默帮助应对困难的情况。

quiz.question: ______ acrobat
quiz.explanation: 杂技演员, 马戏团杂技演员. The circus acrobat performed amazing aerial stunts. 马戏团杂技演员表演了惊人的空中特技。

quiz.question: offbeat _____
quiz.explanation: 不寻常的; 非传统的, 不寻常的幽默. His offbeat humor appeals to a niche audience. 他不寻常的幽默吸引了小众观众。

quiz.question: browbeat _______
quiz.explanation: 威吓; 恐吓, 威吓证人. The lawyer tried to browbeat witness during cross-examination. 律师在盘问时试图威吓证人。

quiz.question: __________ feat
quiz.explanation: 功绩; 壮举, 非凡的壮举. Climbing Mount Everest is a remarkable feat. 攀登珠穆朗玛峰是一个非凡的壮举。

quiz.question: _______ threat
quiz.explanation: 威胁; 恐吓, 严重的威胁. Climate change poses a serious threat to humanity. 气候变化对人类构成严重的威胁。

quiz.question: _________ retreat
quiz.explanation: 撤退; 退却, 战略性撤退. The general ordered a strategic retreat from the battlefield. 将军命令从战场进行战略性撤退。

quiz.question: entreat _____
quiz.explanation: 恳求; 乞求, 恳求恩惠. She would entreat favor from the king. 她会向国王恳求恩惠。

quiz.question: _____ caveat
quiz.explanation: 警告; 告诫, 法律警告. The contract included an important legal caveat. 合同包含了一项重要的法律警告。

quiz.question: __ _________ fiat
quiz.explanation: 命令; 法令, 通过行政命令. The president ruled by executive fiat. 总统通过行政命令统治。

quiz.question: ____ gnat
quiz.explanation: 小昆虫; 蚊蚋, 微小的蚊蚋. A tiny gnat buzzed around the picnic food. 一只微小的蚊蚋在野餐食物周围嗡嗡作响。

quiz.question: _________ turncoat
quiz.explanation: 叛徒; 变节者, 政治叛徒. The political turncoat switched parties for personal gain. 政治叛徒为了个人利益转换了政党。

quiz.question: ______ moat
quiz.explanation: 护城河, 城堡护城河. The castle moat protected the fortress from invaders. 城堡护城河保护堡垒免受入侵者侵害。

quiz.question: _____'_ spat
quiz.explanation: 小争吵; 口角, 情侣的小争吵. They had a minor lover's spat but reconciled quickly. 他们有一次小的情侣争吵,但很快和解了。

quiz.question: ___ carat
quiz.explanation: 克拉, 一克拉. The diamond ring weighed one carat. 这枚钻石戒指重一克拉。

quiz.question: __ technocrat
quiz.explanation: 技术官僚, IT技术官僚. The IT technocrat led the company's digital transformation. IT技术官僚领导了公司的数字化转型。

quiz.question: ______ aristocrat
quiz.explanation: 贵族, 法国贵族. The French aristocrat owned vast estates. 法国贵族拥有大片庄园。

quiz.question: ________ autocrat
quiz.explanation: 独裁者, 绝对独裁者. The absolute autocrat ruled with unlimited power. 绝对独裁者以无限权力统治。

quiz.question: _______ habitat
quiz.explanation: 栖息地, 自然栖息地. Deforestation destroys the natural habitat of many species. 森林砍伐破坏了许多物种的自然栖息地。

quiz.question: ________ hemostat
quiz.explanation: 止血钳, 外科止血钳. The surgeon used a surgical hemostat to control bleeding. 外科医生使用外科止血钳来控制出血。

quiz.question: ____ cravat
quiz.explanation: 领巾; 领带, 丝质领巾. The gentleman wore an elegant silk cravat. 这位绅士戴着一条优雅的丝质领巾。

quiz.question: enact _______
quiz.explanation: 制定; 颁布, 颁布改革. The government will enact reforms to improve education. 政府将颁布改革以改善教育。

quiz.question: ____ _ pact
quiz.explanation: 协议; 条约, 签署协议. The nations agreed to sign a pact for mutual defense. 各国同意签署互防协议。

quiz.question: compact ___
quiz.explanation: 紧凑的; 小型的, 小型汽车. She drives a fuel-efficient compact car. 她开一辆节能的小型汽车。

quiz.question: counteract _______
quiz.explanation: 抵消; 对抗, 抵消影响. The medication will counteract effects of the poison. 这种药物将抵消毒药的影响。

quiz.question: tract __ ____
quiz.explanation: 大片土地; 小册子, 大片土地. The farmer owned a large tract of land. 农民拥有一大片土地。

quiz.question: detract ____
quiz.explanation: 减损; 贬低, 减损. The minor flaws don't detract from the overall quality. 小瑕疵不会减损整体质量。

quiz.question: retract _________
quiz.explanation: 撤回; 收回, 撤回声明. The politician was forced to retract statement. 政客被迫撤回声明。

quiz.question: protract _______
quiz.explanation: 延长; 拖延, 延长争端. Legal complications will protract dispute for years. 法律复杂性将使争端延长数年。

quiz.question: extract ____
quiz.explanation: 提取; 摘录, 提取数据. Scientists can extract data from the experiment results. 科学家可以从实验结果中提取数据。

quiz.question: ______ tact
quiz.explanation: 机智; 圆滑, 社交机智. Diplomats require excellent social tact. 外交官需要出色的社交机智。

quiz.question: contact ____
quiz.explanation: 接触; 联系, 隐形眼镜. She wears contact lens instead of glasses. 她戴隐形眼镜而不是眼镜。

quiz.question: exact _______
quiz.explanation: 精确的; 确切的, 精确的数字. The report requires exact figures for all expenses. 报告需要所有费用的精确数字。

quiz.question: _____________ defect
quiz.explanation: 缺陷; 缺点, 制造缺陷. The recall was due to a manufacturing defect. 召回是由于制造缺陷。

quiz.question: disaffect ___ ____
quiz.explanation: 使不满; 使疏远, 使基层不满. The policy changes will disaffect the base supporters. 政策变化将使基层支持者不满。

quiz.question: disinfect ________
quiz.explanation: 消毒, 消毒表面. Clean and disinfect surfaces regularly to prevent disease. 定期清洁和消毒表面以预防疾病。

quiz.question: ________ dialect
quiz.explanation: 方言, 地区方言. Each area has its own distinct regional dialect. 每个地区都有自己独特的地区方言。

quiz.question: reflect __
quiz.explanation: 反射; 反思, 反思. Take time to reflect on your decisions. 花时间反思你的决定。

quiz.question: genuflect ______ _____
quiz.explanation: 屈膝; 跪拜, 在祭坛前跪拜. Worshippers genuflect before altar as a sign of respect. 崇拜者在祭坛前跪拜以示尊敬。

quiz.question: ____ intellect
quiz.explanation: 智力; 才智, 敏锐的智力. She possesses a keen intellect and analytical mind. 她拥有敏锐的智力和分析性思维。

quiz.question: ______ aspect
quiz.explanation: 方面; 面貌, 面部特征. The doctor noted unusual facial aspect in the patient. 医生注意到病人不寻常的面部特征。

quiz.question: ______ prospect
quiz.explanation: 前景; 展望, 职业前景. The job offers excellent career prospect for growth. 这份工作为成长提供了极好的职业前景。

quiz.question: suspect ______
quiz.explanation: 怀疑; 嫌疑犯, 可疑的动机. Police questioned him about his suspect motive. 警方询问他关于可疑动机的问题。

quiz.question: resurrect _ _____
quiz.explanation: 复活; 使复兴, 复兴一个品牌. The company plans to resurrect a brand from the 1980s. 公司计划复兴一个1980年代的品牌。

quiz.question: _________ sect
quiz.explanation: 教派; 宗派, 宗教派别. The religious sect has unique beliefs and practices. 该宗教派别有独特的信仰和实践。

quiz.question: _____ intersect
quiz.explanation: 相交; 交叉, 道路相交. The two roads intersect at the traffic light. 这两条道路在红绿灯处相交。

quiz.question: dissect ____
quiz.explanation: 解剖; 剖析, 解剖青蛙. Biology students learn to dissect frog in laboratory. 生物学学生在实验室学习解剖青蛙。

quiz.question: ________ edict
quiz.explanation: 法令; 敕令, 皇家敕令. The emperor issued an imperial edict throughout the kingdom. 皇帝在全国颁布了皇家敕令。

quiz.question: indict __ _______
quiz.explanation: 起诉; 控告, 以罪名起诉. The grand jury will indict on charges of fraud. 大陪审团将以欺诈罪名起诉。

quiz.question: _____ __ interdict
quiz.explanation: 禁令; 阻止, 发布禁令. The court will issue an interdict against the company. 法院将对该公司发布禁令。

quiz.question: ____ verdict
quiz.explanation: 裁决; 判决, 陪审团裁决. The jury verdict found the defendant guilty. 陪审团裁决被告有罪。

quiz.question: afflict ____ ____
quiz.explanation: 折磨; 使痛苦, 使遭受痛苦. Arthritis can afflict with pain for years. 关节炎可以使人遭受多年痛苦。

quiz.question: depict _ _____
quiz.explanation: 描绘; 描述, 描绘场景. The painting accurately depict a scene from history. 这幅画准确地描绘了历史场景。

quiz.question: evict ______
quiz.explanation: 驱逐; 逐出, 驱逐租户. The landlord tried to evict tenant for nonpayment. 房东试图因不付款而驱逐租户。

quiz.question: convict _ _____
quiz.explanation: 定罪; 证明有罪, 给小偷定罪. The jury will convict a thief based on the evidence. 陪审团将根据证据给小偷定罪。

quiz.question: mulct _ ______
quiz.explanation: 罚款; 诈取, 诈骗受害者. The scammer tried to mulct a victim of their savings. 骗子试图诈骗受害者的积蓄。

quiz.question: distinct _________
quiz.explanation: 明显的; 清楚的, 明显的优势. Experience gives her a distinct advantage in hiring. 经验给她在招聘中带来了明显的优势。

quiz.question: defunct _______
quiz.explanation: 不再存在的; 倒闭的, 倒闭的公司. The defunct company closed operations last year. 这家倒闭的公司去年停止了运营。

quiz.question: ___ duct
quiz.explanation: 管道, 空气管道. The air duct system circulates fresh air throughout the building. 空气管道系统在整栋建筑中循环新鲜空气。

quiz.question: abduct _____
quiz.explanation: 绑架; 诱拐, 绑架儿童. Criminals attempted to abduct child from the playground. 罪犯试图从操场上绑架儿童。

quiz.question: deduct ___
quiz.explanation: 扣除; 减去, 扣除税款. The company will deduct tax from your paycheck. 公司将从你的薪水中扣除税款。

quiz.question: _____ aqueduct
quiz.explanation: 渡槽; 输水道, 罗马渡槽. The ancient Roman aqueduct still stands today. 古老的罗马渡槽至今仍然屹立。

quiz.question: ____ conduct
quiz.explanation: 传导; 进行, 传导热量. Metals conduct heat efficiently through their structure. 金属通过其结构有效地传导热量。

quiz.question: construct _ ______
quiz.explanation: 建造; 构造, 建造一座桥. Engineers will construct a bridge across the river. 工程师将在河上建造一座桥。

quiz.question: facet __ ____
quiz.explanation: 方面; 侧面, 生活的方面. Education affects every facet of life. 教育影响生活的各个方面。

quiz.question: dulcet _____
quiz.explanation: 悦耳的; 甜美的, 悦耳的音调. The singer's dulcet tones captivated the audience. 歌手悦耳的音调迷住了观众。

quiz.question: ________ lancet
quiz.explanation: 柳叶刀; 刺血针, 外科刺血针. The doctor used a surgical lancet for the procedure. 医生用外科刺血针进行手术。

quiz.question: faucet ______
quiz.explanation: 水龙头, 水龙头把手. Turn the faucet handle clockwise to stop the flow. 顺时针转动水龙头把手以停止流水。

quiz.question: _____ cadet
quiz.explanation: 学员; 军校学员, 海军学员. The naval cadet trained at the military academy. 海军学员在军事学院接受训练。

quiz.question: fleet __ _____
quiz.explanation: 舰队; 车队, 船队. The navy deployed a fleet of ships to the region. 海军向该地区部署了一支船队。

quiz.question: __ discreet
quiz.explanation: 谨慎的; 小心的, 保持谨慎. Please be discreet about this confidential matter. 请对这件机密事务保持谨慎。

quiz.question: _____ gadget
quiz.explanation: 小装置; 小器具, 方便的小器具. This handy gadget makes cooking much easier. 这个方便的小器具使烹饪变得容易得多。

quiz.question: midget ___
quiz.explanation: 侏儒; 微型的, 微型汽车. He raced a midget car at the local track. 他在当地赛道上驾驶微型汽车比赛。

quiz.question: budget _______
quiz.explanation: 预算, 预算赤字. The government faces a large budget deficit this year. 政府今年面临巨大的预算赤字。

quiz.question: beget _______
quiz.explanation: 产生; 引起, 产生结果. Hard work will beget results in the long run. 从长远来看,努力工作将产生结果。

quiz.question: _____ cachet
quiz.explanation: 威望; 声誉, 品牌声誉. The designer label has significant brand cachet. 这个设计师品牌有显著的品牌声誉。

quiz.question: crochet ____
quiz.explanation: 钩针编织, 钩针编织钩. She used a crochet hook to make a blanket. 她用钩针编织钩制作了一条毯子。

quiz.question: ________ prophet
quiz.explanation: 先知; 预言家, 圣经先知. The biblical prophet warned of coming disasters. 圣经先知警告即将到来的灾难。

quiz.question: ______ epithet
quiz.explanation: 绰号; 称号, 种族侮辱语. Using a racial epithet is never acceptable. 使用种族侮辱语是永远不能接受的。

quiz.question: whet ___ ________
quiz.explanation: 磨快; 刺激, 刺激食欲. The appetizer will whet the appetite for the main course. 开胃菜将刺激人们对主菜的食欲。
